sentence in indonesian using the words: Sepatu yang digunakan sangat nyaman.
english translation: The shoes used are very comfortable.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Barang-barang penting harus dicek sebelum pergi.
english translation: Important items need to be checked before leaving.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Minyak kelapa dihasilkan dari kelapa.
english translation: Coconut oil is produced from coconuts.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia akan dipromosikan menjadi manajer.
english translation: He will be promoted to manager.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tanda di dahi melambangkan kepercayaan.
english translation: The mark on the forehead symbolizes belief.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia suka mencium bunga-bunga di taman.
english translation: She likes to kiss the flowers in the garden.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bau makanan di restoran itu sangat sedap.
english translation: The smell of food at that restaurant is very delicious.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ketika jatuh, dia terluka pada sikutnya.
english translation: When he fell, he injured his elbow.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ia mengalami nyeri pada pergelangan tangannya.
english translation: He experienced pain in his wrist.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Buah yang paling enak adalah buah di telapak tangan.
english translation: The most delicious fruit is the one in the palm of your hand.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kuku-kuku tangannya dilukis dengan warna-warna cerah.
english translation: Her nails are painted with bright colors.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Merokok dapat merusak paru-paru kamu.
english translation: Smoking can damage your lungs.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jantung adalah salah satu organ penting dalam tubuh manusia.
english translation: The heart is one of the important organs in the human body.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Olahraga rutin sangat baik untuk kesehatan badan.
english translation: Regular exercise is very good for body health.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bulu mata dan kening adalah fitur wajah yang menarik.
english translation: Eyelashes and eyebrows are attractive facial features.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia memiliki kerutan di jidatnya yang membuatnya terlihat tua.
english translation: She has wrinkles on her forehead that make her look old.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia menggunakan pensil alis untuk merapikan alis matanya.
english translation: She uses an eyebrow pencil to tidy up her eyebrows.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia sering memakai headphone sehingga kupingnya terasa sakit.
english translation: She often wears headphones, so her ears feel sore.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Lukanya ada di bagian belakang tubuhnya.
english translation: Her injury is on the back of her body.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ibu memberikan gelang emas sebagai hadiah ulang tahun.
english translation: Mom gave a gold bracelet as a birthday gift.
